title: Issues in Educational Reform
description: Explores a variety of perspectives on key educational policy issues including desegregation, bilingual education, affirmative action, charter schools, national and state curriculum standards, student assessment and the assessment and certification of teachers.

pre_req_data.text: Enrollment is restricted to junior and senior education, democracy and justice majors, science education majors, STEM & EDUC minors, or by permission of instructor.
